definition: Yuncheng prefecture level city in Shanxi 山西

Yuncheng prefecture level city in Shanxi 山西
Yuncheng prefecture in Shanxi

sentences.english: Yuanqu county located at the south of Shanxi province, the northeast of Yuncheng .
sentences.chinese: 垣曲縣位於山西省南端，運城地區東北隅。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the current serious situation of water resources in Yuncheng City.
sentences.chinese: 分析了當前運城市水資源面臨的嚴峻形勢。

sentences.english: Yuncheng Salt Lake is the first salt lake developed by ancient Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 運城鹽湖是中國古代人民發展的第一個鹽湖。

sentences.english: The paper analyzes the necessity of introducing bidding mechanism in the whole urban planning in Yuncheng City.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了運城市城市總體規劃引入招標制的必要性。

sentences.english: Yuncheng basin is the main grain and cotton producing area of shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 運城盆地是山西省的主要糧棉產區。

sentences.english: Cultural tourism and Guan Gong culture in Yuncheng area is inseparably interconnected.
sentences.chinese: 運城地區的文化旅遊與關公文化是相輔相成的。

sentences.english: The use of salt in China originated in Yuncheng City, Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 鹽的利用始於山西省運城。

sentences.english: YunCheng is the only special salt routine city in history.
sentences.chinese: 運城是中國歷史上唯一的鹽務專城。

sentences.english: Yunchen salt pond is a bright pearl in He Dong region.
sentences.chinese: 運城鹽池，是河東地區一顆璀璨的明珠。

sentences.english: The production of salt pond has long history.
sentences.chinese: 運城鹽池的池鹽生產，歷史悠久，源遠流長。

sentences.english: Yuncheng is a typical non- excellent district of tourism.
sentences.chinese: 運城市是一個典型的旅遊非優區。
